record.field: Contact name in report "%(name)s" must contain name and surname
Currency in AEAT 349 report "%(name)s" must be Euro.
Not possible to cancel the invoice %(invoice)s becasue it's on AEAT349 report %(report)s.
There are some invoices lines from invoices %(invoices)s that will be erased in 349 repotrs. To do that the reports %(reports)s must be canceleld or drafted.
There are some moves from shipments %(shipments)s that will be erased in 349 repotrs. To do that the reports %(reports)s must be canceleld or drafted.
